page.title: 19NASSINGTON'S SPECIAL DAYS 85
page.content: Our report includes the main events in the block from July 1984 to July 1985. {January}Ringing-In New Year.{February} School Jumble Sale held on the snowiest night of the winter.Some parents from Woodnewton got stuck going back up Woodnewton Hill,and had to leave cars in Nassington!{March}Friends of Nassington School(FoNS)Barn Dance, Family Service,Mothering Sunday. {April}Family Service,Easter,Sponsored Bible Reading-continuous reading in church by villagers for 40 hours to raise money for church and Ethiopian Starvatoin Fund.{May}May Day Gala, Gala,Nassington Fotball Club disco. {June}Church Fete in Vicarage Garden, Band played,lots of stalls and side shows including tombola,spinning jenny, bowls,shooting,throwing water and wet sponges at our head teacher in the stocks!430 pounds raised.(cont.p20)
